World.Name: Wyatt
World.Entry:
December, 1050: Wyatt understands the difference between friendly and hostile animals January, 1051: Wyatt can track the animals in the area February, 1051: Wyatt: Hi Clara Clara: Hi Wyatt! Mum sent me to tell you to do some chores around the farm instead of just relaxing all the time. If you want though, we could sneak off and go play instead! Wyatt: I'll think on it - you always were a bad influence on me Clara: Hey - that's what sisters are for!
February, 1051: Wyatt does nothing all month March, 1051: Wyatt does nothing all month
